mapper.select: select log_id, log_user_id, log_request_url, log_request_remote_ip, log_request_parameter, log_request_method_and_interface, log_request_page_name, log_request_describe, log_request_time, log_type from myproject.logger where log_id = #{logId}
mapper.insert: insert into myproject.logger(log_id, log_user_id, log_request_url, log_request_remote_ip, log_request_parameter, log_request_method_and_interface, log_request_page_name, log_request_describe, log_request_time, log_type) values (#{logId}, #{logUserId}, #{logRequestUrl}, #{logRequestRemoteIp}, #{logRequestParameter}, #{logRequestMethodAndInterface}, #{logRequestPageName}, #{logRequestDescribe}, #{logRequestTime}, #{logType})
mapper.update:
update myproject.logger
log_user_id = #{logUserId},
log_request_url = #{logRequestUrl},
log_request_remote_ip = #{logRequestRemoteIp},
log_request_parameter = #{logRequestParameter},
log_request_method_and_interface = #{logRequestMethodAndInterface},
log_request_page_name = #{logRequestPageName},
log_request_describe = #{logRequestDescribe},
log_request_time = #{logRequestTime},
log_type = #{logType},
where log_id = #{logId}
